attributes.action: Safer roads for our children. traffic calming outside all schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My child has nearly been knocked down and just before christmas a young girl was killed crossing the the road because of a speeding driver. how many of our children will have to die before permanant action is taken, help me in our campayne.I would like to have TRAFFIC CALMING MEASURES ouside ALL schools for example 20mph or speed camaras.
